TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 處理特定組態區段的存取。

span.span: Handles the access to certain configuration sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **重要** .NET Framework 2.0 及更新版本已被取代。**Important** is deprecated in .NET Framework 2.0 and above. 但是，因為它會在內部使用，已保留。But, because it is used internally, it has been kept. 您可以找到範例[How to： 建立自訂組態區段使用 IConfigurationSectionHandler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07f68a3f-2920-4665-a824-47bda744e662)。You can find an example at [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using IConfigurationSectionHandler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07f68a3f-2920-4665-a824-47bda744e662). 如果您使用上一個範例，請建置以.NET Framework 1.0 或 1.1 版。If you use the previous example, please build it with the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版和更新版本，您必須改為衍生自類別來實作相關的組態區段處理常式。In .NET Framework version 2.0 and above, you must instead derive from the class to implement the related configuration section handler. 您可以找到範例[How to： 建立自訂組態區段使用 ConfigurationSection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234)。You can find an example at [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using ConfigurationSection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234). 執行個體類別必須是具備執行緒安全且無狀態。Instances of the class must be thread safe and stateless. 方法同時必須可從多個執行緒。The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. 此外，組態物件產生的方法必須具備執行緒安全，且不變。Furthermore, the configuration object generated by the method must be thread safe and immutable. 組態物件會由組態系統快取，因為很重要，不能修改父引數方法。Because the configuration objects are cached by the configuration system, it is important not to modify the parent argument to the method. 例如，如果的傳回值小處修改必須父代，而非原始檔案的複本上進行的父代，實際的修改。For example, if the return value of is only a small modification of the parent, actual modifications must be made on a clone of the parent, not the original.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed
Public Function Create (parent As Object, configContext As Object, section As XmlNode) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Create(System::Object ^ parent, System::Object ^ configContext, System::Xml::XmlNode ^ section);
abstract member Create : obj * obj * System.Xml.XmlNode -> obj

summary.span: 建立組態區段處理常式。

returns.span: 已建立的區段處理常式物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別必須是具備執行緒安全且無狀態。Instances of the class must be thread safe and stateless. 方法同時必須可從多個執行緒。The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. 此外，組態物件產生的方法必須具備執行緒安全，且不變。Furthermore, the configuration object generated by the method must be thread safe and immutable. 組態物件會由組態系統快取，因為很重要，不能修改父引數。Because the configuration objects are cached by the configuration system, it is important not to modify the parent argument to . 例如，如果的傳回值小處修改必須父代，而非原始檔案的複本上進行的父代，實際的修改。For example, if the return value of is only a small modification of the parent, actual modifications must be made on a clone of the parent, not the original.
